captions.text: What do you think about this?
What? There are three bullets in the body.

One bullet is in the kitchen utensil.
On the whole, there are four ones.
This is too many for self-defense.

After Valeria Verbinina’s story
“A Square of Love and Hate”

Story by Valeruu Iliushchenko,
Alina Semeriakova
I don’t want to go by plane.

In spite of all the difficulties faced
by the bank’s management

in its struggle for independence,
we have achieved over 56 million rubles

from the Trade Invest Group
that has not become our partner.
This has happened against the background

that according to statistics
of the National Bank,

of our segment have suffered losses
which make over 56 billion rubles.

The income of our bank was
caused by increase of client’s trust.

Within the last six months
we have managed to raise

our gross credit portfolio
to 1.125.950.000 rubles.

Our bank continues
to fulfill its duties before the clients
in what concerns the deposit agreements.

Viacheslav Ivanovich,
some lady wants to see you.

I am your niece Zhanna,
I am from Gremiachinsk.

I have just arrived. Mother died.
I have sent you a telegram.

You did not talk to my mother, but those
 were old rows. So much time has passed.

I remember you how you threw me
to the ceiling, and I was laughing.

Mother told me that you had
become quite a different man.
But it seems to me, you haven’t changed.

Uncle Slava. There is no work
at all in Gremiachinsk.

Last year I graduated from the university,
specialized in management.

Suddenly mother died.
I decided to go to you. Oh!
My dear niece. Meet her, honey.

Oh, so many new things have appeared.
Have you finished?

We have a supermarket,
the internet – in the post-office.

Three schools, a college,
my university, where I studied.
Are you going back to your roots?
Uncle Slava, would you like some tea?
Aunt Olia has gone to sleep.
Wonderful! It brings accent to your neck.
Could you hold her for a moment?

I was not sure whether it was you.
Then I have recognized you.

Oh my god. Marina!
Why are you here, an Australian soul?

I don’t know. The wind has changed,
now I am again in my native harbor.
Have you had a kink again?

Again, again. I will tell you everything,
but not here. Let’s go somewhere.
Okay, I am taking the pendent.

– One minute.
– I am waiting for you.
Oh, you are so nice. You are my…

Please give me this ring,
put into a present package.
Watch… don’t pack it, no. Okay.
Our niece Zhanna. Where do you come from?

Okay. Zhanna, wait for me in the car.
We have to talk.

Oh, Lolita Fedorovna,
will you stay with Zhanna for a while?
Don’t stroke her. She does not like it.

This is Slava’s niece. His sister died,
now the girl accompanies me everywhere.

– Good evening. Mochito, please.
– And Cosmopolitan.

He came up to me on the beach
and asked in broken English,

“Excuse me, missis, how can
I get to the Sydney-Opera.”

But his appearance said eloquently
that he came from the USSR.

I replied, “What are you talking about,
comrade? I am not married.”

He was so surprised.
This was how we met each other.

We did not go to the Opera. We could
hardly wait until we get to the room.
I am telling you, he’s a King-Kong.

He’s a beast.
He brought coffee in bed there,

he ordered oysters to the room,
he pured me with champaign.
And here he is like a silkmoth.
Olia, but I have nobody to talk to.

Look, there is a guy
resembling young Jean Renau.

Girls in the dormitory
house must be fond of him.

But after graduation
he will stay in the office
from morning till night, earning money.
And Kuzia is already a general.

Yes. We have celebrated
his stripes in winter.

And Galia is general’s wife now.
She said good bye to diets.
Now she is supposed to be fat.
What are staring at? Take the car.

I will tell Kolia to bring you
wherever you say.
And I will arrange things with your fright.

Yes. It was wonderful.
I haven’t seen her for ages.

Darling, I can’t. We have made
an appointment at the salon.
I should take care of my appearance.

Are you having supper
with your partners and their wives?
Have you been to the editor’s house?

They rejected it. They said
it’s not the format needed.

It is not the word.
They publish bullshit. Voroninas. And here…
I love you too. I like your novel.
It’s a dream in a dream.
You’re my dream in a dream.
I am afraid to wake up.

I all the time imagine
that they will publish you,

And you will put on your jacket,
the watch I gave you.

Then I will be able to give you
something as a present.
You can do this. Take me away.

Steal me, so that
my husband did not find me.
Unemployed. He used to be an actor.

He has written a book
and is trying to publish it.

He’s living on honoraria from films.
He plays in mob scenes.

He’s failure, a weak person.
Women like this sort of men.

The door is there.
My secretary will give you the money.

– Should I bring the bags inside?
– No, I’ll do this myself.

– Where have you been?
– I did the shopping.
Aunt Olia, what about the purchases?
Fire them all and close the firm.

Hun, you should go.
Or the carriage will turn into pumpkin.

Here are toasts with honey
and omelette. Will you have some?

Uncle Slava did this,
I only helped him a bit.

He cried like a baby.
He was very angry with himself.

He said that he was jealous.
But whom can be jealous to?
He has gotten so tired at work.

And your Marina maddens him,
although he has not seen her.

Oh, I have forgotten.
We are having guests today.
Do you have any clothes besides this dress?
Try this on. Yes. It’s not Genichesk here.

– No, aunt Olia.
– Try this on.
I will put on this one.

And this fool has not signed
a marriage contract.

He was getting divorced tearful.
Not because of grief.

His wife tricked him.
He was left with nothing.

He’s a baboon. Who heard of these
contracts twenty years ago?

We all were eating pearl barley every day.
And small sausages on weekends.
Why would you worry? Is everything okay?

Stop it. Is your income growing?
Do you keep money on safe accounts?

Your wife is getting prettier
with every day.

You did not marry a stupid model
who cared only about your money.
Your marriage is firm and stable.

Yes. And only death
will separate us. Okay, bye!
It means that god loves us.

The main thing is not
to lose yourself on the way.

The main thing is not
to lose your money on your way.
He speaks only about what he cares about.
Do you understand? I am a big man.

Calm down, Bill Gates.
You are big problems. Aren’t you?
By the way, listen to an anecdote.

Three well-fed women catch a taxi.
They sit on the back seat.

Suddenly the feel uncomfortable,
too narrow.

One of them says,
“Look, girls. I have an idea.
Let’s sit the way roofs are slated.”
What’s this? Is this us in the photo?
Who still believed in big and poor love.

Okay. Will you tell me everything?
Who is he? Where did you go?

Oh, it has saved all of us.
He optimized everything.

Who wanted to work, is working.
More, better, and cheaper.

We have improved
our business during the crisis.

Especially in what concerns the wives.
How will she behave in hard time?

What tricks will she play?
But I for one feel sure about this.

Mine is calm as a boa.
He thinks that I will always be with him.
It does not matter. Enjoy your life.

Yeah. Take off, buy brilliants,
roll in money. And don’t worry.

I have three ones of your Pasha’s kind,
they all live in parallel worlds.

And my husband
sleeps the sleep of the just.

No, no, you don’t get it.
I was waiting for something.

I thought I had a family.
I wanted children so much.

After so many attempts
I could give birth to a child.
Yeah. Ania lived only for a month.
Then her brain trauma was revealed.

She died, sleeping,
with a smile on her face.
And Slava was on business trip.

He could not postpone it, though he knew
 what the diagnosis was. He saw how I felt.

So, I don’t know,
this all has happened somehow.

Give it a thought.
You had a month of happiness.

And someone cannot even hope.
Just emptiness.

Okay, hush. Stop it.
Hush. That’s all. Okay.

Can you guarantee that
she does not cheat you behind your back?

I am keeping an eye on her.
If I know anything, I will kill both.

No. There is a worse punishment:
I won’t give her money.
And I will kill her gigolo.

Why do you need his surname?
You have his address and photo.
Darling, are you coming? We have no time.

– Leave it.
– I’ll be in a minute.

Take the taxi now. 
I must warn one man. Five hundred dollars.

– Hello.
– Good evening, very nice to meet you.

Thank you for coming. This is all
I have created in the last 12 months.
It’s a nice offer, isn’t it?
Can you go faster? Let’s go faster, please.

Oh, Olga Nikolaevna, I have been
 calling you, but I could not get through.

He’s fine. He’s alive. 
They hit him a couple of times.

Not fatally. 
I will call you back later, okay?
Darling, why are you so nervous?
You better charge your phone. She worries.
Do you like the novel? Is it interesting?

– Where is Zhanna?
– She has a day off!

You’re sick. You should 
go see the doctor. God, what a mad man.

It reacts to the voice, switches 
on its own. It is very sensitive.
It is easy-to-use, because it’s small.
In some cases small seize is an advantage.

Oh. Lady, you have given too much. 
It will go for two dictaphones.

Oh. Lady, you have given too much.
It will go for two dictaphones.
Oh! Well, then give me two ones.

I didn’t call her. I don’t want. 
When can I see you? I miss you.
No, this is not a mouse.
This is a cat. Do you understand?
You must have dialed a wrong number.

It was you who made a mistake, jerk.
Do you see the bench?
Have a seat. Sit down. Sit down!
People will come to you. Sit still.
King-Kong has caught be with our barmen.
Do you remember him, a boy in the café?

It’s not the worst. I was an idiot, 
I did not keep eye on his machinations.

He put all his money 
on his family’s account.

He has nothing, a zero. And this zero 
will be divided into two after divorce.
So, all I have is Lolita Fedorovna.

I will renew my connections.
I will kneel before me.

Olia, can you lend me some 
5,000-6,000 dollars? Please.
Olga, I can’t do like this any more.

Please! He won’t dare.
I will file for divorce.

You can’t live with me. We don’t have
 money to live on. Love in a cottage?

I have seen my lawyer. He said that half of
his money is mine. He will give it to me.
Why did you leave? I told you sit still.
Now come up to the window.

And think well, do you want 
to see it tomorrow again?

If I know you’re seeing someone else, 
I will kill you.

I will publish your bullshit
in a nice cover.

If you like, if you’re afraid of me, 
you will disappear after this.

If you don’t want, you may not disappear.
I will not look for you.
Look. If you don’t do this, other will.

That will be enough 
to live until the old age.

You will risk once 
and have your future in your hands.
You are weak-willed and cowardly scum.

That is why you will 
take this money and this gun,

you will go in the evening to the shop 
on Latyshev street.

There’s too little place 
for parking near this shop.

This is a perfect place. 
There are no witnesses, nobody.

It’s not more complicated 
than fucking another man’s wife.

Cooking the supper. 
I also have to clean the house.
Yes, Uncle Slava asked you to stay home.

Oh, I’m sorry. 
He wants to make a surprise for you,

What’s the reason? You know, it’s Friday. 
I wanted to go to Inna’s shop.

To our anniversary, honey.
It’s today, I remember,

not the day you threw 
the present me in the face.

Listen to the recording.
You will like it. Press here.

That will be enough 
to live until the old age.

You will take a risk once 
and your future will be in your hands.

You can. It’s not more complicated 
than fucking another man’s wife.
You have an affair with a bastard,
who is ready to kill you for money.

He loves only himself 
and his fucken ouevre.
Really? Then go to see him.

And go to the shop on Latyshev street.
Will you take a risk?

I won’t give you a cent 
if you go to him. Is it clear?

You finally decide what you want. 
To kill me? Do you want me to stay?
What are you avenging me for, Valitskiy?
I am not avenging. I love you, honey.
What could he do against you?

What can one do against you? 
We can’t breathe because of you.
Idot! He loves me and told me everything.

What have you proven? 
What have you proven to yourself?
Oh goodness. I did not want to lose you.

It was me who advised him to agree. 
I was interested how far you will go.

Now I know that 
after 18 years of living together

you can kill me, or throw 
in the street like an old dog.

Olia! Excuse me, please. 
I don’t know what’s going on with me.
Please. I’m afraid. Really. I am afraid.
Now you don’t want to kill me?
Fool! It is charged with blank cartidge.
So you really wanted to kill me!
Give me the gun. I’ll explain.
Olia, don’t do this. It’s a mistake.

She wanted to get a divorce. 
He did not want to share money with her.

She found a dictaphone with a recording
how her husband ordered her murder.

In a nutshell, riches were trying 
to divide the money.
The maid tries to calm her down.

I see. Bring the widow here. 
I want to talk to her.
Did you live well with your husband.

I have talked with the girl, 
Zhanna, who works in your house.

A lover. We are adults, 
don’t be looking for words.

So, your lover brought you 
the recording of the conversation,

during which your husband offered 
your lover to kill you?
You have listened to the recording and?
I switched it on for my husband.
Slava got afraid. He attacked me.

And Pasha has given me 
the gun before that. I shot.

He tried to take away the gun. 
I got scared.

Here is an advance, 100,000. That will be 
enough to live until the old age.

You will risk once 
and have your future in your hands.

You can. It’s not more complicated 
than fucking another man’s wife.

So? You have an affair with a bastard, 
who is ready to kill you for money.
So you really wanted to kill me!
Give me the gun. I’ll explain.
Olia, don’t do this. It’s a mistake.

Such a thing happens 
for the first time in my practice.
You should have switched it off yourself.
Your husband pressed the wrong button.
15 years of imprisonment at the least.
Felony murder, and a very cruel one.

Ms. Valitskaya, I detain you 
on the suspicion of felony murder.

I haven’t smoked for a month, 
and don’t recommend you to do so.

What if you offer this Pavel
to kill Aunt Olia?

You will give him a lot of money, 
a gun, but the cartridge should be blank.

Look, you and your uncle
are muddying the water.
He says, blank, you say ball.
I don’t care. Give me the money.

We have no other way out.
They will kill us.

Tell Olga that her husband has ordered her.
And give her the gun.

Make her understand that 
if she doesn’t kill him, he will kill her.

Since you are the only heiress, 
there is no need in testament.

I will arrange the formalities.
I have one more question.

What shall we do with your aunt?
Will we defend her?

Would you defend the person
who killed your only relative?

Zhanna Igorevna, 
that maniac is calling again.

He says that his name is Pavel
and he’s your fiance.
Resolve this problem on your own.
Tell him that I have no fiance.

I don’t know any Pavel.
If he does not stop calling,
follow the call and send the guard there.

Are you a freshman? 
I haven’t seen you before.

Yes, I am. I have been selected 
from among the other candidates.

I will be the coolest driver of the 
most beautiful business lady in the world.
You’re quick. Where have you come from?
It seems to me I have seen your face.
From Gremiachinsk, have you heard about it?

title: Чужие Души / Alien Souls. Фильм. StarMedia. Психологический Детектив. 2009

comments.text:
Досмотрела до конца. Любовь между супругами проходит и с деньгами и без 
них. С ними даже быстрее. Много соблазнов, недоверия, и т.д. и т.п. Это 
племянница скорее отомстила им за пренебрежение. Они же быстренько вместо 
прислуги её определили, вместо того , чтобы помочь по жизни. Она же сирота 
вроде. Я думаю все у неё в башке закрутилось, когда ее дядя за завтраком 
сказал жене "заткнись". Ну а как деньги с ней поступят, это будет уже 
совсем другое кино...

﻿
comments.author: Елена Кузьмина

comments.text:
С богатством всегда одни проблемы, чем богаче, тем круче. Не умеют наши 
люди богато жить. Если сначала слаще морковки ничего не ели, а привалят 
деньги - начинают с жиру беситься! Одно и то же, мужики начинают скупать 
недвижимость, заводить молоденьких любовниц и бухать. Их жёны тратить 
деньги, если муж не жадный, скучать и изменять. Классика жанра:-) Иметь 
достаток, конечно, хорошо. Но мало кто из нас знает сколько ему надо, чтобы 
хватало для счастья... Фильм в целом неплохой, продолжаем смотреть... ( 
Сказал Бог, чтоб ты помог:-) Это на Бог в помощь) Из фильма дернула:-) ﻿
comments.author: Елена Кузьмина

comments.text: ooo!!!!!! kak trudno zhit  bogatim!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!﻿

comments.text: конец не проняла, это что полиция или просто водитель?﻿

comments.text: World is same everywhere. Filth is same everywhere.﻿
comments.author: Asif Hussain

comments.text: Хороший фильм, ну и мадам, прямо железная леди.﻿
comments.author: Галина Черниенко

comments.text:
Фильм шикарный, особенно концовка, очень неожиданная. Все, конечно, от 
скуки и от пустоты...﻿

comments.text: да ! фильм очень классный!!!﻿
comments.author: Anna S

comments.text:
кто нибудь?пожалуйста загрузите российский фильм “ТРАЕКТОРИЯ БАБОЧКИ” ГОД 
ВЫПУСКА 2000. очень хочу увидеть этот фильм?﻿
comments.author: Anna S

comments.text:
Это не он ей мстил, как говорила она... а она ему... за невнимание к ней, 
когда умирал (умер) их ребёнок... И вообще месть всей жизни за то, что она 
не реализовалась, как мать... Глупая и эгоистичная женщина)﻿
comments.author: Алёна Беляева

comments.text:
Такой роскошный дом, а звукоизоляция ни к черту.
И почему нужно говорить по телефону прямо возле ванной?.....
И обниматься с любовником  -  прямо перед окном.....
Все очень надуманно, поверхностно, с претензией на психологию.
А суть - в осном их любимом слове:"Ску-ко-та".............﻿
comments.author: MultiMatola

comments.text:
Красивая актриса..но "растение"..видно режиссёру заплатили за неё... а 
фильм мог получиться..но увы... ﻿
comments.author: Вячеслав Воронов

comments.text: актриса никакая согласна.
comments.author: Tetiana Shcherbinina

comments.text:
Жена-редкостная сволочь. Несколько раз выстрелить в человека... Я читала 
воспоминания ветеранов. Говорят,что очень трудно заставить себя убить в 
первый раз,плакали мужики. А тут муж...﻿
comments.author: Екатерина Пелих

comments.text:
Такой дом, и нет домработницы))) смешно...
Племянница приехала, и резко начала исполнять роль прислуги))﻿
comments.author: Катя Иванова

comments.text:
Фильм показывает,что ради выгоды женщины идут на все не брезгуя ничем. 
Старая истина: Все беды от баб!﻿
comments.author: Igor Istashenkov

comments.text: мужики тоже.
comments.author: Tetiana Shcherbinina

comments.text: Нравится, спасибо большое!﻿
comments.author: ludmila kretova

comments.text:
Отличный фильм. Интересно закрученный сюжет. Актеры хорошие. Зря писать не 
буду.﻿
comments.author: Роман Молоков

comments.text: Дааа уж, до чего доводит безделье... и ревность. Фильм супер рекомендую!﻿
comments.author: кира гнеденко

comments.text:
Хороший фильм,смотрится на одном дыхании.Коварство и предательство - как в 
жизни,так и есть.﻿
comments.author: Ирина Шиманская

comments.text:
отличный сериал, талантливые актеры.
Старая истина - не в деньгах счастье.﻿
comments.author: asdf54u

comments.text:
Well, I guess in real life the investigator of the problem would definitely 
dig in this crime to find out the truth. Skazka.﻿
comments.author: Gulshen Huseynli

comments.text:
Ella Beijne: Im not a lawyer. But i have been in the situation about 9yrs 
ago, I gave the cop $200 and he looked the other way. Not that i did 
something, but that he wanted me to pay him off, and cuz i was a US 
citizen, he could do want ever he wanted. Long story short, if you have 
money "BIG money" you can do whatever you want and the cops are only happy 
to take it.
comments.author: Angelina Penkert

comments.text: Nu blin ti i zagnula..((( Are you a lawyer???))))
comments.author: Ella Beijne

comments.text:
not in Russia, you pay them off. and that would be the end of it. but what 
goes around comes around, thats just life.
comments.author: Angelina Penkert

comments.text:
Да, правда! Фильм получился! Смотреть не скучно. Люди-судьбы хорошо 
просматриваются. Если героиня (племянница) как бы "на коне" оказалась, 
расплата будет ого-го...
﻿
comments.author: Marina Peräkylä

comments.text:
это верно....вот жрали бы они перловку а по воскресеньям перловку с 
сосисками.... и работали ,работали тяжело... и зарабатывали бы гроши.... 
тогда об любовниках не мечтали...это уж точно...
comments.author: Lyudmyla Vorobets

comments.text:
da... i na chto toliko liudi ne idut radi bogatstva.priutili plemiannitsu 
na svoiu golovu.
comments.author: Olga Omic

comments.text: оооо как же всё медленно то
comments.author: Татьяна К

comments.text:
Глубокий смысл прослеживается в фильме: не в деньгах счастье. Если бы эти 
люди хотя бы немного знали бы Бога, то имели бы страх Господень и каждый 
отвечал бы перед Богом за свои планы и поступки.Всех, кто отказывается от 
Него, ожидает вот такой конец. И племянницу тоже, если не покается. 
Богатство сразу же изменило ее, а гордость ведет в падение.
comments.author: Любовь Истинная

comments.text: Так и нада делать молодец девка
comments.author: Alex Shved

comments.text:
Классный фильм ,так с богатыми и надо экспорприация экспорприаторов ,я 
доволен !
comments.author: Alex Shved

comments.text: ПРИМЕР ДЛЯ ГЛУПЫХ
comments.author: АЛЕКС ЛИХАЧ

comments.text:
Вот такие бабы жиру бесятся. Любовников - альфонсев и приспособленцев 
заводят.
comments.author: Владимир Лиманский
